I really liked their new and creative concepts like bottle shaped lamps, turtle planter and lot more... Keep it up and thank you :) <span>Rashmi Jain</span></p>\n              </li>\n              <li>\n                <p>This an amazing site. She really liked it and the message card with my personal message on it worked as a cherry on the cake. Thanks for making her b'day soooo special.. :) :) :) \"</p>\n                      <p class=\"credits\"><span>Neha Srivastava</span></p>\n                    </li>\n                    <li>\n                      <p class=\"context\">\"I have ordered a personalised pillow for my very close friend's birthday. It feels amazing after someone special to u receives a very special gift. You guys made it happen. choose</li>\n          </ul>\n        </div>\n\n                <style>\n\t\t\tp.sub-head{text-align: left !important;float: left; margin-top: 10px; width: 100%; color: #00357E; font: bold 13px Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;}\n\t\t\tp.hsubtxt{float: left; font-size:18px!important; padding: 0 0 7px; margin: 30px 0 20px 0!important;}\n\t\t</style>\n\t\t\n        <div class=\"home-page-content\">\n\t\t<h2 class=\"cmhead\">Buy / Send online gifts to India through hassle free services</h2>\t\t\n          <p>\n\t\t  So many important occasions, some many important relations and lesser holidays to make it to every occasion. Now, if you really want to wish them nothing can stop you from sending gifts to India with this website dedicate to your celebration. We have brought those perfect gifts that will be ring the door bells just in time. <a href=\"/birthday-gifts\" style=\"margin-top:0; color:#9C9C9C; text-decoration:none;\">Birthday Gifts</a>, anniversary, wedding, Holi, Diwali, Christmas, valentine's, <a href=\"/doctors-day-gifts\" style=\"margin-top:0; color:#9C9C9C; text-decoration:none;\">doctors day</a> and all those special days when you want to make them feel special, we are just a simple click away to unravel the gifting world. \n          </p>\n\t\t  \n\t\t<h2>We are here when you want to send online gifts to India</h2>\n        <p>\n        We know you feel giving money in those fancy envelopes is the best way out for any celebration but, listen to us when we say a gift should be meaningful. It is very thoughtful of you to look out for their interest when you give them money to buy what they like. But, associating a gift with the occasion increases its importance several folds. Most of us, sit back and think for once what to gift before we get to a decision. That is the time when you get to best online gift sites in India to look for a gift within your budget. We have a special service for our Delhi NCR customers, where we offer <a href=\"/delhi-ncr\" style=\"margin-top:0; color:#9C9C9C; text-decoration:none;\">same day gift delivery in Delhi ncr.</a>\n\t\t</p>\n\t\t  \n\t\t<h2>This online gift shop makes your celebration everlasting</h2>\n        <p>\n        With all the preparations and bookings, one of the major parts of attending any celebration is getting the right gift. Your search for a right gift box is over with this online gift shop that makes sure none of the occasion passes by without a smiling gift box of wishes. Gifting gives an inner satisfaction, knowing this we have lined up a range, for <a href=\"/anniversary-gifts\" style=\"margin-top:0; color:#9C9C9C; text-decoration:none;\">anniversary gifts</a>, <a href=\"/wedding-gifts\" style=\"margin-top:0; color:#9C9C9C; text-decoration:none;\">wedding gifts</a> and handpicked according to the mood of the occasions. \n\t\t<br><br>\n\t\tTo score that overwhelming smile form your loved ones, you need to make that extra effort of selecting the right one. With all the caught up schedule and daily dos, we talk care of your special celebrations. You would realized that online gifting is not a hard one and saves a lot of your time. Gifts get anywhere in India to wish them on your behalf and can easily make you the part of their happy day. \n\t\t</p>\n\t\t  \n\t\t<h2>Find something new every time on this Online Gift Shopping Site in India</h2>\n        <p>\n\t\tInterests and likes could be anything and everything and thats what this range is all about. Online gifts that are colorful, communicative, attractive and meaningful can be a part of their lives in no time. The struggle you go through for months to find a gift that impresses and the last minute rush from shop to shop is not going to be the case anymore. We are right here with a whole new range for every season. We have brought a special <a href=\"/personalised-gifts\" style=\"margin-top:0; color:#9C9C9C; text-decoration:none;\">personalized gifts</a> range for the stories that look for a personal touch.\n\t\t<br><br>\n\t\tTo cater to each one's interest and preference we have got in fashion gifting ideas to let you choose from for each special day and occasion. To match up the taste and be up to date we have got birthday gifts online, anniversary gifts online, wedding gifts online and gifts for all occasions because happiness at times does not need a reason. We keep adding up new gifts to our cart so stop by for all your gifting needs with gifts and cards reaching anywhere in India and abroad. To cope up with the rush hours and limited shopping time we offer online gift delivery service with international reach. Send gifts to India, USA, UK, Singapore and many more on the list. Send gifts for brother, gifts for sister, gifts for him, gifts for her, we gifts for all your near ones. We have special online gifts for all festivals like: Diwali Gifts, Bhai Dooj Gifts, Christmas Gifts and Karwa Chauth Gifts on the website.\n\t\t</p>\n\t\t  \n\t\t<h2>Buy online gifts according to age, relation and celebration</h2>\n        <p>\n        When you have got all of it at one place it becomes difficult to decide for the best. All the dilemma of whether it would be a right thing to offer is going to go away with sorted items under separate categories. <!--End of Zopim Live Chat Script-->\n\n</script>\n<!--  //FOOTER -->\n\n\n<!-- //top --> \n\n\n<!--  .............. Mobile Menu ............. -->\n\t<script language=\"javascript\">\n\t//jquery easing 1.3.js\n\tjQuery.easing.jswing=jQuery.easing.swing;jQuery.extend(jQuery.easing,{def:\"easeOutQuad\",swing:function(e,f,a,h,g){return jQuery.easing[jQuery.easing.def](e,f,a,h,g)},easeInQuad:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f+a},easeOutQuad:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*(f/=g)*(f-2)+a},easeInOutQuad:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f+a}return -h/2*((--f)*(f-2)-1)+a},easeInCubic:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f*f+a},easeOutCubic:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*((f=f/g-1)*f*f+1)+a},easeInOutCubic:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f*f+a}return h/2*((f-=2)*f*f+2)+a},easeInQuart:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f*f*f+a},easeOutQuart:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*((f=f/g-1)*f*f*f-1)+a},easeInOutQuart:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f*f*f+a}return -h/2*((f-=2)*f*f*f-2)+a},easeInQuint:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*(f/=g)*f*f*f*f+a},easeOutQuint:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*((f=f/g-1)*f*f*f*f+1)+a},easeInOutQuint:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*f*f*f*f*f+a}return h/2*((f-=2)*f*f*f*f+2)+a},easeInSine:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*Math.cos(f/g*(Math.PI/2))+h+a},easeOutSine:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*Math.sin(f/g*(Math.PI/2))+a},easeInOutSine:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h/2*(Math.cos(Math.PI*f/g)-1)+a},easeInExpo:function(e,f,a,h,g){return(f==0)?a:h*Math.pow(2,10*(f/g-1))+a},easeOutExpo:function(e,f,a,h,g){return(f==g)?a+h:h*(-Math.pow(2,-10*f/g)+1)+a},easeInOutExpo:function(e,f,a,h,g){if(f==0){return a}if(f==g){return a+h}if((f/=g/2)<1){return h/2*Math.pow(2,10*(f-1))+a}return h/2*(-Math.pow(2,-10*--f)+2)+a},easeInCirc:function(e,f,a,h,g){return -h*(Math.sqrt(1-(f/=g)*f)-1)+a},easeOutCirc:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h*Math.sqrt(1-(f=f/g-1)*f)+a},easeInOutCirc:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g/2)<1){return -h/2*(Math.sqrt(1-f*f)-1)+a}return h/2*(Math.sqrt(1-(f-=2)*f)+1)+a},easeInElastic:function(f,h,e,l,k){var i=1.70158;var j=0;var g=l;if(h==0){return e}if((h/=k)==1){return e+l}if(!j){j=k*0.3}if(g<Math.abs(l)){g=l;var i=j/4}else{var i=j/(2*Math.PI)*Math.asin(l/g)}return -(g*Math.pow(2,10*(h-=1))*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j))+e},easeOutElastic:function(f,h,e,l,k){var i=1.70158;var j=0;var g=l;if(h==0){return e}if((h/=k)==1){return e+l}if(!j){j=k*0.3}if(g<Math.abs(l)){g=l;var i=j/4}else{var i=j/(2*Math.PI)*Math.asin(l/g)}return g*Math.pow(2,-10*h)*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j)+l+e},easeInOutElastic:function(f,h,e,l,k){var i=1.70158;var j=0;var g=l;if(h==0){return e}if((h/=k/2)==2){return e+l}if(!j){j=k*(0.3*1.5)}if(g<Math.abs(l)){g=l;var i=j/4}else{var i=j/(2*Math.PI)*Math.asin(l/g)}if(h<1){return -0.5*(g*Math.pow(2,10*(h-=1))*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j))+e}return g*Math.pow(2,-10*(h-=1))*Math.sin((h*k-i)*(2*Math.PI)/j)*0.5+l+e},easeInBack:function(e,f,a,i,h,g){if(g==undefined){g=1.70158}return i*(f/=h)*f*((g+1)*f-g)+a},easeOutBack:function(e,f,a,i,h,g){if(g==undefined){g=1.70158}return i*((f=f/h-1)*f*((g+1)*f+g)+1)+a},easeInOutBack:function(e,f,a,i,h,g){if(g==undefined){g=1.70158}if((f/=h/2)<1){return i/2*(f*f*(((g*=(1.525))+1)*f-g))+a}return i/2*((f-=2)*f*(((g*=(1.525))+1)*f+g)+2)+a},easeInBounce:function(e,f,a,h,g){return h-jQuery.easing.easeOutBounce(e,g-f,0,h,g)+a},easeOutBounce:function(e,f,a,h,g){if((f/=g)<(1/2.75)){return h*(7.5625*f*f)+a}else{if(f<(2/2.75)){return h*(7.5625*(f-=(1.5/2.75))*f+0.75)+a}else{if(f<(2.5/2.75)){return h*(7.5625*(f-=(2.25/2.75))*f+0.9375)+a}else{return h*(7.5625*(f-=(2.625/2.75))*f+0.984375)+a}}}},easeInOutBounce:function(e,f,a,h,g){if(f<g/2){return jQuery.easing.easeInBounce(e,f*2,0,h,g)*0.5+a}return jQuery.easing.easeOutBounce(e,f*2-g,0,h,g)*0.5+h*0.5+a}});\n\t\n\t//Mobile Menu js\n\t\"use strict\";!function(e){e.fn.mobileMenu=function(n,i){function t(n,i){var a=n.items,o=void 0!==i,r=p(o),m=d(i,r),y=s(n.title);r.append(y),o&&r.append(m);var k=u(r);w.closeStatic?(k.addClass(\"static\"),r.addClass(\"closeStatic\"),1===b&&e(\"#mobileMenuWrapper\").append(k)):r.prepend(k),l(o,r),e.each(a,function(e,i){var a=v().item;\"section\"in i?a.addClass(\"more\"):i.url&&c(a,i.url),a.append(i.name),r.append(a),a.on(\"click\",function(e){if(\"section\"in i){g++;var a=n.title;t(i.section,a)}})}),o||(\"top\"===w.openFrom?h.css(\"top\",f().height*-1):h.css(\"left\",f().width*-1))}function a(){for(var n=v().open,i=0;i<3;i++){var t=v().line;n.append(t)}return e(\"#mobileMenuWrapper\").append(n),n}function o(){\".mobileMenuOpener\"===w.opener&&a();var n=w.animation,i=\"top\"===w.openFrom?{top:0}:{left:0};e(w.opener).on(\"click\",function(t){h.css(\"display\",\"inline-block\"),e(this).animate({opacity:0},n.speed,function(){e(this).css(\"display\",\"none\")}),e(\".close\").css(\"display\",\"block\"),e(\".close\").animate({opacity:1},n.speed),h.animate(i,n.speed,n.easing)})}function s(e){var n=v().title;return n.append(e),n}function c(e,n){e.on(\"click\",function(){window.location.href=n})}function p(e){var n=v().page;return n.css(\"height\",f().height),e&&n.css(\"left\",f().width),h.append(n),n}function l(e,n){if(e){var i=w.animation;n.animate({left:0},i.speed,i.easing)}}function d(e,n){var i=v().btn;return i.append(\"< \"+e),i.on(\"click\",function(e){r(n)}),i}function r(e){var n=w.animation;e.animate({left:f().width},n.speed,n.easing,function(){e.remove()})}function u(n){var i=v().close,t=w.animation;return i.on(\"click\",function(n){if(w.closeAll)for(var a=1;a<g;a++){var o=e(\".page\").not(e(\".page\").eq(0));r(o)}i.animate({opacity:0},.2*t.speed,function(){i.css(\"display\",\"none\")}),h.animate({left:f().width*-1},t.speed,t.easing,function(){h.css(\"display\",\"none\"),e(w.opener).css(\"display\",\"block\"),e(w.opener).animate({opacity:1},t.speed)})}),b++,i}function f(){return{height:e(document).height(),width:e(document).width()}}function v(){var n=w.shadow?\"page shadow\":\"page\";return{page:e('<div class=\"'+n+'\"></div>'),item:e('<div
